summary:
As a business communication professional with over five years of experience in corporate communication and digital marketing, I specialise in helping organizations connect with their audiences in genuine and engaging ways. Whether it's crafting compelling content, managing social media campaigns, or developing integrated communication strategies, I thrive on delivering measurable results that drive business success.

But my interests don't stop at work! In my free time, you can find me on a football pitch or tennis court or curled up watching (usually bad) horror movies. And whenever there's live rock or blues music playing (Led Zeppelin rocks ü§ò), I'll be in the front row, cheering along. 

I'm always up for new challenges and opportunities to grow, both personally and professionally, so feel free to reach out and connect!
